sms.title: Features of the SMS activation message

list.1: The most economical option to send OTP within Egypt without additional costs to the message price.
list.2: Send OTP in your company name if you have a commercial register and tax card.
list.3: Or use public sender as an alternative to obtaining official documents.

whatsapp.title: Features of the WhatsApp activation message

list.1: The best option to send international and local OTP messages.
list.2: Activate the service officially via Meta to ensure your number is never blocked.
list.3: Send OTP under your business name without the need for official documents through BeOn engineers using cloud WhatsApp activation.
